name: BRAINVOIDER
description:
A strange aventure made for the Lowrez jam 2022.

This is a prototype demo, not really a game.

Inspired by the old survival horror and adventure games, like "alone in the dark".

Try to escape of the complexe !

CONTROL

Use gamepad, or arrow to move, enter and space.

Use [F] or [escape] to use fullscreen mode on windows version.

Use ENTER to increase the speed of the text at the introduction.
